comments.body: probably need a `#-- or --` here for people that don't read well, or some other way to say "one or the other please, not both" ;)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +183,187 @@    ansible_shell_type=cmd
    # ansible_shell_type=powershell

The value for ``ansible_shell_type`` should either be ``cmd`` or ``powershell``.
Use ``cmd`` if the ``DefaultShell`` has not been configured on the SSH service
